title: Share of people owning microwave ovens in Germany 2008 to 2017
summary: This statistic presents the development of Share current account holders , who use people owning to communicate with their bank at least once a month in the Germany ( ) from 2008 to 2017 .
By 2017 , it can be seen that 65 % of respondents stated they used people owning at least once a month .

The increases observed in people owning usage were steep over time : in 2008 , only 65 % of current account holders on the British market turned monthly to people owning as a secure way of communicating with their bank .
gold: The figure shows the share of households owning microwave ovens in Germany from 2008 to 2017.
Over the time period under consideration , microwave oven ownership has decreased from 80 percent of respondents in 2008 to 65 percent in 2017 .
